name: X/Twitter Search
author: Shinkai

apiKey.description: RapidAPI key for Twitter API access. Get from rapidapi.com/twttrapi-twttrapi-default/api/twttrapi

description: Searches and retrieves tweets, users, and suggestions from X/Twitter API. Requires RapidAPI key

command.description: Operation to perform: search-top (trending), search-suggestions (autocomplete), search-latest (recent), get-user-posts, get-post-by-id

searchQuery.description: Search terms for finding tweets. Required for search-top, search-suggestions, search-latest commands

tweetId.description: Numeric tweet ID to fetch. Required for get-post-by-id command

username.description: Twitter username (without @) to fetch posts from. Required for get-user-posts command

data.description: JSON response from Twitter API containing tweets, users, or suggestions based on command
